about.content: As an accomplished Full-Stack Developer, I specialize in designing and delivering scalable applications that drive innovation. My strong grasp of both frontend and backend technologies enables me to create solutions that resonate with users. I thrive in dynamic environments, continuously embracing new technologies to enhance application quality and functionality.
about.heading: From Corporate Strategy to Your Strategic Partner
about.summary: With over 30 years of experience in corporate strategy and business transformation, I bring a wealth of knowledge to help businesses navigate complex challenges and seize growth opportunities.

items.question: Who is your ideal client?
items.answer: I primarily work with established small to medium-sized businesses (typically $1M - $10M in annual revenue) that are poised for growth but lack the internal strategic clarity to get to the next level. My ideal clients are ambitious founders and leaders who are open to new ideas and ready to take decisive action.
